title: Yang Rutherford "2.0" font
content:
Hello typophiles,

I would be very grateful if someone could take a stab at the following font used on the Yang Rutherford [web-site](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021023109/http:/www.yangrutherford.com/).

The screenshot below is from the PROFILE \> ABOUT US section.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021023109im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typophile_5182.yang.rutherford.jpg)
author: zalmoxe
